name: Prove Your Love
description:
have fun and don't forget to report bugs and comment your youtube video if you play my game, i'd love to see your video :)

sadly many versions of the game are currently missing but hopefully not in the future

did you find the secret ending? just search around myproject very well and you might find it, please don't spoil it in the comments, ok?

this game was made in 6 days for the vimjam gamejam, but due to technical issues with uploading the game i had to fix it so it got removed from the gamejam
